start.intro: Enter your heat pump its IP-address, give it a name and choose which 'special modes' you like to control. Notes: 1/ not all 'special modes' might be supported by your particular heat pump model. 2/ the use of a static IP-address is preferred as DHCP is not supported.
start.title: Daikin equipment settings
start.error: An error has occurred, check the just entered IP-address.
start.add: Your settings are being saved now...
start.adaptersensira: Default (BRP069B--, B-model FW ≤ 2.0.1) adapter settings will be applied!! As necessary change these after pairing is completed.
start.adapteremura: Default (BRP069A--, A-model FW ≥ 1.4.3) adapter settings will be applied!! As necessary change these after pairing is completed.
start.adapternexura: Default (BRP069A--, A-model FW ≥ 1.4.3) adapter settings will be applied!! As necessary change these after pairing is completed.
start.adapterhomekit: Default (BRP069A--, A-model FW ≥ 1.4.3) adapter settings will be applied!! As necessary change these after pairing is completed.
